channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mattermost Notification Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mattermost Notification Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10459|2024-08-04T22:24:18.538Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mattermost%20notification%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mattermost Notification Plugin 2.7.0 and earlier stored webhook URLs containing a secret token unencrypted in its global configuration file and job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they could be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.
